<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Change Listener Details</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/lbaas-listeners/{lbaas-listeners_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Change specific listener identified by its unique ID.
